help.name: Help
help.description: Help action shows and describes standard command line and related parameters. Also, using [-inventory] you can get the list of all registered actions. If in the command line will be included [-call ActionName] will be displayed the help text of returned by that specified action name. In case of [-call ...] parameter is not specified, Help action displays this text.

option.description: Returns a list of all registered actions
Specifies a registered action that is called to retrieve its help document. 'subaction' parameter alias could be used in order to obtain the same thing
Export help content into a supported document format (see 'exportformat' options)
Exports help document related to the action specified by 'call' parameter into the specified file path and name
In case the 'outputfile' is null (not specified) this parameter could mention the file format for the help document requested for export

sample.description: Displays the whole help text of Help action called from AREasy server. This is a client call to the server that is described in the configuration file
Displays the list of registered action on the AREasy server. This is a client call to the server that is described in the configuration file
Displays the help text delivered by the data.wrapper.file action, from the server instance described in the configuration file
Display the list of registered action on the local AREasy distribution, called as a Runtime instance

Displays the complete help text of Help action called from 'localhost' AREasy server instance. The action is execute on that server and the answer (this help text) is returned in the client console (where this command has been executed)
